altTitles.en: The Villainess's Life, I'll Try Living It
I Will Live the Life of a Villainess

altTitles.es-la: Viviré Esta Reencarnación Como La Villana

description.en:
On her way home, the protagonist, Jung Yuna, gets into a traffic accident.
And just when she thought she had died... she opens her eyes to find herself in a splendid bedroom?!

Observing for about a week, she realizes that the person she has possessed was the notorious villainess from the novel she had read before her death, "The Lady of the White Rose."

Not only that, but she was the ultimate villainess who only did wicked things to the heroine and ended up dying at the hands of the male lead!
Can Elena successfully avoid her novel's fate?

altTitles.en: One Day, My Dad Showed Up

altTitles.fr: Mon père demi-dieu tombé du ciel

altTitles.ja: 突然現れたパパは溺愛夫でした

altTitles.zh: 有一天我的父亲出现了

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的半神爸爸是癡情郎

description.en:
Young Claire lives with her mother and her twin sister in a humble country home. Feeling mature for her age, Claire is tired of being different from everyone she's ever met. However, when her father suddenly appears, she realizes that she wasn't the only "strange" one in the family. As she slowly learns about her family's past, she understands more about herself and her destiny.

---

description.fr:
Dans un monde où sont tombés du ciel des Astariols, demi-dieux envoyés pour lutter contre le mal, la petite Claire est une enfant dont la maturité d'esprit et les pouvoirs surnaturels la démarquent des autres enfants de son âge. Elle vit avec sa sœur jumelle Rashel et sa mère Charlotte, de village en village au fil de leurs déménagements inopinés. Mais tout change lorsque le duc Arshel Constantine Disandos débarque subitement dans leur vie.

---

description.ja:
普通の子どもとはどこか違う「クレール」は
双子の「イシエル」と母の「シャーロット」と共に暮らしていた。

そんな彼女が９歳になった春。
突然、存在すらも知らなかった父が目の前に現れた…！

「静かに暮らしていたのにどうして今になって訪ねてきたの？セルシアス公爵閣下」
「でしたらもうそろそろ賑やかになってもいい頃合いでは？」

…誰か2人の関係を説明してくれない？

description.pl:
Młoda Claire mieszka z matką i siostrą bliźniaczką w skromnym wiejskim domu. Czując się dojrzałą jak na swój wiek, Claire jest zmęczona byciem inną od wszystkich, których kiedykolwiek spotkała. Jednak kiedy nagle pojawia się jej ojciec, zdaje sobie sprawę, że nie była jedyną "dziwną" osobą w rodzinie. W miarę jak powoli poznaje przeszłość swojej rodziny, rozumie więcej o sobie i swoim przeznaczeniu.

title.en: I Became a Childhood Friend of a Mid-Level Boss

altTitles.en: I Became the Childhood Friend of the Middle Boss

description.en:
Do Kyunwoo is the black sheep of his renowned swordsman family. He cannot even catch a rabbit on his own. On his first day of fifth grade, he meets a tranfer student and recalls his past life.

He had reincarnated into the world of a game he used to play called [Brave Hearts]. He was already frustrated that he had reincarnated as a loser, but on top of that, the transfer student is an intermediate/mid-tier boss who will destroy the world!

“Why are you being so nice to me?”

“Because I want to be friends with you.”

Do Kyunwoo’s plan is to become friends with the transfer student in order to prevent the end of the world!

In order to survive in this new world and to reach an ending he desires. He becomes best friends with the mid level boss.

Seth is an apprentice sorcerer from the Pompo Hills. Like all sorcerers, he's an "infected", one of the few people having survived an encounter with a Nemesis, those creatures falling from the sky and destroying everything around them. Being immune to them, Seth wants to become a Hunter and fight the Nemesis. But what Seth really wants is to find the source of all Nemesis, the Radiant. Helped by his fellow sorcerers, he will seek the Radiant, under the harsh scrutiny of the Inquisition…


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2021)
description.fr:
Seth est un aspirant sorcier de la région des Pompo Hills. Comme tous les sorciers, c'est un " infecté " : un des rares êtres vivants ayant survécu au contact des Némésis, ces créatures tombées du ciel qui contaminent et déciment tous ceux qu'elles touchent. Son apparente immunité lui a fait choisir une voie qui lui semblait toute désignée : devenir Chasseur et combattre les Némésis.  
  
Mais plus que ça, Seth souhaite s'engager dans une quête qui dépasse la simple chasse aux monstres… Entouré d'une faction de sorciers, il parcourt le monde à la recherche du Radiant, le berceau présumé des monstres, sous l'oeil terrible de l'Inquisition…  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/nep_radiant)  
- [Mangaka’s Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tonytonyvalente/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](https://www6.nhk.or.jp/anime/program/detail.html?i=radiant)  
- [Official Page (JP)](http://www.euromanga.jp/category/title/radiant/)
description.ru: В мире, где на землю снизошёл гнев небес и появились мстители, человечество пытается из последних сил выжить… Как бы противно и страшно людям не было, но они вынуждены сотрудничать с существами, не менее опасными и ужасающими, чем пришельцы… С проклятыми изгоями общества, с колдунами! Сет – молодой, энергичный ученик колдуна, бравый парень, пытающийся под началом своего учителя уничтожить своего первого мстителя… Волей судьбы он находит его… или их… ДА ТУТ ЦЕЛОЕ СТАДО!!! Вперед, Сет! Вжарь им!
description.pt-br: Seth é um aprendiz de feiticeiro das colinas de Pompo. Como todos os feiticeiros, ele é um "infectado", uma das poucas pessoas que sobreviveram a um encontro com um Nêmesis, criaturas que caem do céu e destroem tudo ao seu redor. Sendo imune a eles, Seth quer se tornar um caçador e lutar contra os Nêmesis. Mas o que Seth realmente quer é encontrar a fonte dos Nemesis, o Radiant. Ajudado por seus companheiros feiticeiros, ele buscará o Radiant, sob a rigorosa caça da Inquisição contra os feiticeiros.

title.en: I Don't Want to Be a Lady

description.en:
Before being sold as the Crown Prince’s concubine, I proposed a contract marriage to the Duke.

“Will your father allow you to marry me?”
“Of course not. So there is only one way.”

“We have to make an accident.”

It will taste better when I break that mol*ster’s head.
I could shoot a gun at the alley gangster. Even the prince of the neighboring empire was also knocked out by me.

The man snorted.

“You’re so arrogant as the captive subject. I never knew that Count Bornes would be a jerk to his dog.”

I said with a smile, “Our mansion didn’t have a dog. Because the owner of the mansion is already a dog.”

This is the story of Arianne Bornes, who seemed to be a villainess but not a villainess.
description.ko:
망나니 황태자의 정부로 팔려가기 전, 공작에게 계약 결혼을 제안했다.

“당신의 부친께서 저와의 혼인을 허락해 주실까요?”
“아니죠. 그러니 방법은 하나뿐이에요.”

“사고를 쳐야죠.”

치한은 머리를 깨줘야 맛.
골목 건달에게는 총알을 박아주고
이웃 나라 황자도 때려눕혔다.


남자가 코웃음 쳤다.

“포로로 잡힌 주제에 건방지기는. 보르네스라면 그 집 개새끼까지 싸가지 없을 것 같단 말이지.”

아리안느가 싱긋 웃으며 말했다.

“우리 집엔 개 안 키워. 이미 주인이 개새끼잖아.”

악녀인 듯 악녀 아닌 악녀 같은 그녀, 아리안느 보르네스의 파란만장 스토리.

altTitles.en: We Live Together
Shall We Live Together?

description.en: After dying in an accident, an ordinary woman wakes up next to her favorite fictional character, the handsome Duke Roan von Bannester. Not only that, but she's now Delisse, his villainous wife! In the novel, they divorce due to Delisse's abuse, but the new Delisse is set on changing this. To try and thaw Roan's infamously icy heart, she showers him with fangirlish affection. But while living together may be her dream come true, can Delisse successfully transition from fangirl to loving wife?

altTitles.zh: 想不通可爱老婆为什么要与我结婚

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiǎng bùtōng kě'ài lǎopó wèishéme yào yǔ wǒ jiéhūn

description.en: My wife is suspicious!! Why did she marry a guy like me…? Ordinary average guy Tsuchioka Naotsugu ended up with Yoshino, who's perfect in all angles of beauty, know-how, and sociability. It's not "marriage blue" it's everyday life questioning over things, so it's "marriage gray" newlywed life, go!
description.ja: ウチのかわいすぎる妻は、なぜ超平凡な自分と結婚したのか――!?　自己評価激低な夫・槌岡直継は、妻・憙乃への疑念から“マリッジグレー”に陥っていた！　一方の憙乃は、日々溢れまくる直継へのLOVEを抑えるのに一生懸命で…!?　相思相愛な新婚夫婦の、激甘かけ違いラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: Minha esposa é muito suspeita! Eu não entendo por que ela se casou com alguém como eu? Por que uma mulher bonita, inteligente, e considerada como a Yoshino se casaria com alguém comum como Naotsugu!! Não há casamento azul aqui, apenas um suspeito caso de casamento cinza!!

description.en:
A comedy 4-koma manga revolving around the normal life at school of the minor characters of Fate/stay night and Fate/hollow ataraxia, specifically the character Himuro Kane, classmate of Fate/stay night protagonist Emiya Shirou.  
  
It tells about the normal school life of the supporting characters Himuro Kane, Makidera Kaede and Saegusa Yukika. Other characters are the regular cast of the main games: Mitsuzuri Ayako, Tohsaka Rin, Ryuudou Issei, Matou Shinji, Emiya Shirou, Kuzuki Souichirou, Fujimura Taiga, Matou Sakura, Mitsuzuri Minori; "guest" characters from other series Ciel, Seven, Sajyou Ayaka (formerly the heroine of the never finished prototype novel of Fate/stay night) are also featured, and other classmates Gotou Gai, Fujimoto, Dezaki, Hirumata.  
  
The story is centered around classic school events such as a ball game tournament, field trips and inter high school competitions. As such, there is no reference at all to supernatural things like magecraft and Heroic Spirits.

title.en: Realist Maou ni Yoru Seiiki Naki Isekai Kaikaku

altTitles.el: Η θρυλική ανακατασκευή ενός κόσμου από έναν ρεαλιστή βασιλιά δαίμονα

altTitles.ru: Король демонов — реалист. Легенда о перестройке мира

altTitles.ja: リアリスト魔王による聖域なき異世界改革

altTitles.zh: 现实主义魔王的异世界改革

altTitles.ko: 리얼리스트 마왕에 의한 성역없는 이세계 개혁

altTitles.zh-hk: 現實主義魔王的異世界改革

altTitles.en: The Legendary Rebuilding of a World by a Realist Demon King
The Reformation of the World as Overseen by a Realist Demon King

description.en:
In a dilapidated castle, Astaroth awoke as a Demon King. With his ‘wisdom from his past life,’ he would rule over his lands as a thorough ‘realist.’ “Demon King, why are you attacking the level 1 Heroes?” “Defeat them before they become stronger. That is called strategy.”  “Demon King, why are you sending fake money to the enemy country?” “To bring chaos to their economy, so they will self-destruct.” “The werewolf troops have attacked. Should we use silver bullets?” “Not bullets, shoot them with cannons.”  
  
And like that, Astaroth ‘reformed’ the old tendencies. He became a lord who was loved by the people and his subordinates, and he would go on to be called the most powerful Demon King in history.
description.ja: 72の魔王が跋扈する混沌とした世界に、72番目の魔王として転生したアシュタロト。そんな彼の前に突如謎の女神が現れ、この世界を改革するようアシュタロトを導く。初めに召喚したメイド兼参謀の魔族・イヴを従え、現実主義者（リアリスト）魔王の伝説がはじまる！
description.pt-br: Em um castelo em ruínas, Astaroth acordou como um Rei Demônio. Com sua "sabedoria de sua vida passada", ele governaria suas terras como um completo "realista".Conheça quem se tornou um senhor que era amado pelo povo e seus subordinados, o homem que seria chamado de o mais poderoso rei demônio da história.

altTitles.en: Come Rain or Shine

description.en: Country-born Mikoto and student council member Ren have always spent their time after school together. But one day, that ordinary routine suddenly comes to an end… With Uchouten High School as the stage, the love and youth of these impressionable young girls is about to begin!
description.pt-br:
Mikoto, nascida no interior, e Ren, membro do conselho estudantil, sempre passam o tempo juntas depois da escola. 
  Mas um dia, essa rotina normal chega subitamente ao fim... 
Com a escola Uchouten como palco, o amor e a juventude destas jovens impressionáveis ​​estão prestes a começar!

altTitles.fr: La magie de cet autre monde est trop en retard!

altTitles.th: พ่อมดไร้เทียมทานกับมนตราล้าหลัง

altTitles.ja: 異世界魔法は遅れてる！

altTitles.en: The Magic in this Other World is Too Far Behind!
The Other World's Magic Is Too Far Behind!

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界魔法實在太落後！

altTitles.zh: 异世界魔法实在太落后！

description.en:
Suimei and two of his best friends find themselves mysteriously summoned to another world. There’s a cute princess, magic galore, a Demon Lord that needs to be defeated, and a world that needs to be saved — the works! Too bad Suimei isn’t interested.

His friends are all too ready to play the parts of heroes, but Suimei just wants to get home. He has an advantage as a magician... but he’s in for a rude awakening when he finds out what actually passes for magic in these parts.
description.fr: Un héros est invoqué dans un autre monde depuis le Japon moderne… Et ses deux amis par accident aussi… Yakagi Suimei transporté par erreur, refuse de combattre les armées du Roi Démon … Suivons la rencontre de Felmenia Stingray, magicienne royale, et Yakagi Suimei, Magicien moderne.
description.pt:
Baseado em uma série de Light Novel, Isekai Mahou wa Okureteru conta a história de uma jovem maga chamada Felmenia Stingray, que conhece um garoto que está aprisionado por se recusar a ajudar o Herói a derrotar o rei demônio depois de ser convocado (acidentalmente) para um outro mundo. "Romance"  
  


---
description.pt-br: Baseado em uma série de Light Novel, Isekai Mahou wa Okureteru, conta a história de uma jovem maga chamada Felmenia Stingray, que conhece um garoto que está aprisionado por se recusar a ajudar o Herói a derrotar o rei demônio depois de ser convocado (acidentalmente) para um novo mundo.

description.en: High school home ec expert Tenichi earns extra money with a part-time job cleaning houses. But one day, Himari, the owner and model of the popular cosmetics brand Hima Riz, transfers into his class. Say hello to some company president girl x house-cleaner boy romantic comedy hijinks!

altTitles.ja: エンジェル・ハート 1stシーズン

description.en:
A young Taiwanese assassin codenamed "Glass Heart" committed suicide by jumping off a building, and her heart was pierced by a metal fence. Miraculously, her life was saved by heart transplantation. During her recovery she began to experience strange dreams, which led her to Japan looking for the donor of her heart, who happens to be Kaori Makimura, former partner of City Hunter.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics
description.ja: 台湾の黒社会組織の殺人兵器として養成された少女グラス・ハート。彼女は自殺を図るが、シティーハンターのパートナー槇村香の心臓を移植され一命をとりとめる。蘇ったグラス・ハートは組織を抜け出し、香の記憶に導かれるように新宿・リョウの元へ。やがて二人は香の心臓という絆で、再会をはたすのだが……!?
description.es-la: Una joven asesina taiwanesa con el nombre clave de "Corazón de Cristal" se suicidó saltando desde un edificio, y su corazón fue atravesado por una valla metálica. Milagrosamente, su vida se salvó gracias a un trasplante de corazón. Durante su recuperación comenzó a experimentar extraños sueños, que la llevaron a Japón en busca del donante de su corazón, que resulta ser Kaori Makimura, antigua compañera de City Hunter.

altTitles.en: Guardian Girlfriend
Virus Girlfriend

description.en: Faced with doomsday, the special power inside Ling Mo was woken up. He found out that he could control zombies. Therefore he could walk through the zombie crowd safe and sound using his power, and eventually, he met his beloved girlfriend - Ye Lian, but only to find out that she had already been transformed into a zombie. To help Ye retrieve her memories, Ling Mo started his survival in doomsday.
description.pl: W obliczu dnia zagłady, Ling Mo przebudził wewnątrz siebie specjalną moc. Odkrył on, że może kontrolować zombie. Dlatego mógł bezpiecznie przejść przez tłum zombie i przeżyć, a ostatecznie spotkał swoją ukochaną dziewczynę - Ye Lian, ale tylko by dowiedzieć się, że została już przekształcona w zombie. Aby pomóc Ye odzyskać swoje wspomnienia, Ling Mo rozpoczął swoje przetrwanie podczas apokalipsy.
description.es-la: Ante el día del juicio final, el poder especial dentro de Ling Mo fue despertado. Él se percató que podía controlar a los zombis. Debido a su poder, podía caminar sano y salvo a través de la multitud de zombis, y eventualmente se reunió con su amada novia, Ye Lian, pero solo para descubrir que ella ya se había transformado en un zombi. Para ayudarla a recuperar sus recuerdos, Ling Mo comenzó su supervivencia en el día del juicio final.
description.pt-br: Diante do apocalypse, o poder especial dentro de Ling Mo foi despertado. Ele descobriu que podia controlar os zumbis. Por causa de seu poder, Ele podia caminhar em segurança através de hordas de zumbis, e, eventualmente, ele se reencontrou com sua amada namorada – Ye Lian, Apenas para descobrir que ela já havia se transformado em um zumbi. Para ajudá-la a recuperar suas memórias, Ling Mo embarca em uma jornada para sobreviver no apocalypse.

altTitles.en: Sakura Fantasy

description.en:
Should you sell dreams? Buy dreams? Or...?
Oiran (courtesan), the business of selling dreams.
Though he reigns at the top of his courtesan profession, Tankou leads a boring life.
While gazing at the fleeting yet beautiful...and hateful cherry blossoms blooming before his eyes, a mysterious person named "Yoru" appears.
Who on earth is she?

altTitles.en: Bamboo Samurai

description.en:
Early one New Year's morning, the rounin Senou Souichirou appears in Edo's Katagi tenements.  
  
Initially, the inhabitants regard him with fear and suspicion: Kankichi, the carpenter's son, thinks he may not be human; the neighborhood cats remark that he reeks of blood. But soon Souichirou pawns his sword, and, with a bamboo replica at his waist, settles down to a quiet life as the neighborhood school-teacher.  
  
Months pass, and all appears to be well. But trouble will not leave the Katagi tenements alone …  
  
---
- **Won the 15th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2011**

altTitles.en: A Bouquet for an Ugly Girl
April Showers Bring May Flowers

description.en:
Tabata Hana is a lonely, negative and unpopular high school girl. Her class' most handsome guy, Yousuke, accidentally witnessed her happily pretending to be a heroine in the classroom one early morning…!? You will definitely come to support this love as well! A comedy with a self-deprecating, unpopular girl!  
  
**Note:** Do not tag as shoujo. This manga is published in Young Ace which is a seinen magazine.

altTitles.ja: もしかして: 地雷女

altTitles.en: Maybe: Landmine Princess

title.en: Peony: Dreaming of the Dangerous Grand Duke

altTitles.en: I Saw the Future With the Killer Grand Duke

altTitles.es-la: Vi un futuro con el Gran Duque asesino
Peony: Vi un futuro con el Gran Duque asesino

description.en: Today, I am getting married for the second time to my husband, as the daughter of the imperial family he hates. Pretending to be good, pretending to be weak, pretending to be poor. I possessed Gabriella Nashert, a villainess who possesses the ‘three-piece combo’ that enrages the readers. In order to escape her scheduled death, she asked Ernst Esqes, the Northern Grand Duke, to marry her on a contract. The three years spent with her husband, away from where the original incident took place, were quite sweet. Even though it ended with my death. "If you and I meet in our next life, please marry me again." However, when I woke up again, I found out that I became the daughter of the family who’s responsible for my death?

title.en: I Became My Son's First Love

description.en: In order to support her older sister, Eve Jenna, the beautiful second daughter of a poor countryside baron, agreed to marry Count Hound. Despite his age, Count Hound holds the title of being the empire's most handsome man, a rich and powerful playboy with numerous women on each arm - and thus only interested in a lady of the house and not someone to warm his bed. He already had numerous children, the oldest of which is even a year older than Eve, so no need to bear him an heir either. So, for 3 years, the two had a harmonious marriage as partners who hardly interferre with each other's private lives, until the Count suddenly requests a divorce. Naturally, as he is the one to break their contract first and thus has to pay out compensation, Eve is happy to agree...

title.en: Dameo no Shiina-senpai to Yabao no Sasaki-kun

altTitles.ja: ダメ男の椎名先輩とヤバ男の佐々木くん

description.en: Sasaki-kun, a slightly crazy boy, is in love with his senpai, a bad boy, and he likes that even more! Siina-senpai changes girlfriends more than pants and Sasaki-kun has a record of more than 160 confessions to his senpai. While Siina-Senpai devises ways to make Sasaki give up, Sasaki is in love with this bad boy and won't give up until he wins him.

After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

---

description.de:
Minjoo wird als Schurkin Dahlia Margaret in einem Fantasyroman wiedergeboren und ist niedergeschmettert von der Tatsache, dass ihr ein früher Tod bevorsteht. Aber wenigstens ist sie Sooyeon, der Tyrannin ihrer Highschool entkommen. Oder? Als Dahlia auf Flore trifft, ihre jüngere Schwester und Gegenspielerin im Buch, wird ihr klar, dass es sich dabei um niemand Geringeren handelt als ihre ehemalige Peinigerin. Getrieben von dem Wunsch zu überleben und am besten gleich Rache zu nehmen, ist Dahlia nun auf der Suche nach mächtigen Verbündeten. Ein gut aussehender Adeliger scheint ein geeigneter Kandidat zu sein. Aber wird ein Deal mit dem mysteriösen Mann Dahlia wirklich helfen, ihre Ziele zu erreichen? Oder erwarten sie unangenehme Überraschungen?

description.en:
Reborn into a fantasy novel as a wicked character fated to meet an early demise, Minjoo - now Dahlia Margaret - has a lot on her plate right from the start. But at least she’s now free of her vicious high school bully, Sooyeon. Or is she? When Dahlia meets Flore, her estranged sister and the protagonist of the novel, she is shocked to find that the girl bears a suspicious resemblance to the classmate who tormented her. Now, driven by the desire to save her own life and also get revenge, Dahlia needs to make a powerful ally, and she has her eye on a handsome royal who just might be perfect for the job. However, a deal with this mysterious man might mean more than she bargained for…

---
I wasn't able to overcome the harassment and took my life, but I was reincarnated with the perpetrator? The perpetrator is the heroine, Florre, and I am the villainess, Dahlia, who's going to die horribly.

"They said you are a villain with neither blood nor tears, but unlike the rumors, you often shed tears."

"Your Highness must believe all the nonsense the idiots are talking about, huh?"

Grand Duke of Cervian, the half brother of the male lead and who will be punished for treason afterwards. He approached me. I can't lose the man who will be my greatest ally.

"Your Highness, would you marry me?"

"Now… what did you say?"

"And take revenge together."

A similar situation, a fixed ending. The heroine is not the only one who knows the ending of the novel. I took a long and arduous path of revenge.

---

Minjoo sufría el bullying constante de Sooyeon, pero todo cambia cuando las estudiantes que se odiaban a muerte terminan reencarnando en una novela: Sooyeon aparece en el cuerpo de Flore, la heroína, y Minjoo reencarna en el personaje de Dalia, la villana. Minjoo quiere vengarse de su acosadora, pero para eso debe elaborar un plan y aliarse con el archiduque Yohan. La venganza es un plato que se sirve frío…

description.fr:
Minjoo ne s'attendait pas à terminer dans le corps de Dahlia Margaret, un personnage de roman qu'elle connaît bien. Un destin plutôt agréable et qui rattrape celui de sa vie passée, dans laquelle elle subissait solitude et harcèlement. Ou du moins c'est ce qu'elle pensait, jusqu'à ce que Flore, sa sœur fictive fasse son apparition et que Minjoo se rende compte qu'elle ressemble très étrangement à la camarade de classe qui la persécutait. Afin de garder une vie agréable, mais également de se venger, elle a donc besoin d'un allié puissant, et quoi de mieux que le séduisant Grand duc, Johan, pour remplir ce rôle? Seulement, il se pourrait bien que cette alliance avec ce mystérieux jeune homme lui réserve bien des surprises...

description.id:
Aku bereinkarnasi ke dalam sebuah novel yang kubaca bersama si penganiaya yang telah menjerumuskanku ke neraka. Si penganiaya itu menjadi 'Florre' yang merupakan tokoh utama dalam novel, sedangkan aku menjadi antagonis yang akan mati secara mengenaskan bernama 'Dahlia'.

Aku, Dahlia yang merupakan antagonis berencana untuk membalaskan dendamku pada Florre sang tokoh utama yang telah dimasuki oleh si penganiaya diriku di dunia sebelumnya, yaitu Lee Suyeon. Aku menyiapkan rencana dan menjalankan semuanya demi itu.

"Yang Mulia Grand Duke, maukah anda menikah dengan saya?"
"Apa... yang baru saja anda katakan?"
"Lalu, mari kita balaskan dendam kita bersama."

Yohan Descartes Servien, kakak tiri dari tokoh pria utama, Noel yang ditakdirkan untuk dihukum setelah melakukan pengkhianatan.
Aku tidak boleh melewatkan pria yang akan menjadi sekutu terbaikku ini.

Karena aku sudah bereinkarnasi ke dalam tubuh ini, aku akan memanfaatkannya dengan baik.
Lee Suyeon, rasakanlah juga rasanya terjerumus ke dalam neraka.

description.en:
As if it weren't enough for me to be reincarnated as a child in the slums, I was taken to a city of crime and became a test subject. But then, when I saw the man that came to destroy the research institute, I realized that this place was the world of *Piper*, a reverse harem novel. While living a relatively normal life after escaping from the institute, the heroine of the novel moved in next door. From the looks of it, I might be the heroine's neighbor, an extra. Originally, the heroine was to save the unconscious and fatally wounded villain and in return, be subject to a fanatical obsession. But, why. Why is the sub-villain collapsed in front of my house? The sub-villain, Lakis Avalon, was the king of the underworld and the very same frightening man that I had met at the institute before. I took a moment’'s glance around then I kicked the man’s body away.

Hey, you're got the wrong house, villain.

altTitles.en: Mr. Yano's Ordinary Days

description.en: Yoshida the class president has a nervous temperament. But recently her worries are caused by one of her classmates, Yano. He somehow always arrives at school covered in all sorts of injuries, she can't get her eyes off him! She can't control herself, she needs to patch him up! A slice of life pure romance comedy of an injured boy and a concerned girl!

title.en: I Stole the First Ranker’s Soul

description.en:
One day, Son Mo-Ah fell into a dungeon and became a gathering hunter.
Son Mo-Ah, who somehow narrowly escaped death, was going to live a normal life but gets caught up in a dungeon yet again.
In a moment of crisis, she is rescued by Seo Ji-Han, the number one ranker, and succeeds in surviving the situation. Somehow, Son Mo-Ah got entangled in a fateful relationship with said number one ranker.

But he said something really unusual to me.

“Promise me that you will kill all the dungeons bosses in this world, as many as you can.”

What?

title.en: Even Though I'm a Lesbian a Boy in the Neighborhood Asked Me to Marry Him. But Ten Years Later...

altTitles.ja: 女が好きなのに近所の男の子に求婚された。その10年後・・・

Onna ga Suki Nano ni Kinjo Otokonoko ni Kyuukon sareta. Sono 10-nengo...

altTitles.en: Amina's Lamp

description.en:
On the day of the Wizarding City Paz's destruction, Amina got stuck inside a lamp while trying to turn back time. And 300 years later, she was awakened by a military commander, Jakal.

“I do not have any wishes for you to grant.”
Well, I just want to hurry and grant a wish so I can go back, who the hell is this guy?
  
“Do you know who I am?”
“There is no one else in this world who knows you better than I do.”
“That’s not possible… I’ll disappear one of these days!”

Amina, who needs to go back into the lamp after granted the wishes suddenly meets Jakal who wants to give up his wishes to be with her. However, there are many dangers and threats that prevent him from doing so. Will Amina achieve her wish in the end?

---
Official Translations:
* [Simplified Chinese](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28238)
* [Traditional Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/aminafromlamp/list?title_no=2059)
* [Indonesian](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Lampu-Ajaib-Amina/3355)
* [German](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/aminafromlamp/list?title_no=3262)
* [Thai](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/1870)
description.pl:
Co możesz zrobić z trzema życzeniami?

Amina, jedna z ostatnich magików, utraciła wszystkich, których kochała podczas ataku na pałac. Próbując cofnąć się w czasie, aby ich ocalić, utknęła w lampie.

300 lat później pułkownik Jakal obudził ją.

Ma tylko trzy życzenia nim Amina wróci do lampy.

Czego sobie zażyczy?

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED featuring SUIT CD

description.en: Adaptation of the Gundam SEED SUIT CD drama CDs by Yasushi Yamaguchi

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.en: Gender Change Pandemic
Re-Gender Pandemic

description.en:
Imamura Hinata is a high school boy with a cute appearance.  
Since his trauma with the first love, he wanted to be more manly than anybody else. But one day he woke up to something different…  
The total opposite of his ideal male body!   
Pandemic love comedy!  
  ***
Trivia : Tensei Here Written as (転性) = (性) Means Gender, Not Tensei (転生) = Reincarnation/Re-Living (生)  
  


---
description.fr: Imamura Hinata est un jeune lycéen androgyne. Depuis son traumatisme avec son premier amour, il rêve d’être le plus viril de tous les hommes. Mais un jour, lorsqu’il se réveille, quelque chose en lui a changé… Tout le contraire d’un corps de rêve musclé ! Une comédie romantique contagieuse !
description.pt-br:
Imamura Hinata é um garoto do ensino médio com uma aparência feminina. Desde seu trauma com o primeiro amor, ele desejou ser mais viril. Mas um dia ele acordou com algo diferente... O completo oposto do seu corpo tão desejado!
***
Curiosidade: *Tensei* aqui é escrito 転性 (性 significa gênero), e não 転生 (生 significa reencarnação/reviver).

altTitles.en: Fabulous Beasts
There Are Beasts

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.en: Combatants Will Be Dispatched!

description.en: The Secret Society Kisaragi has one mission: world domination! They claim to be an evil organization, but their scientist is eccentric, their hot female generals wear little clothing, and they’re surprisingly concerned about the fate of the world?! No. 6 is a Combatant for Kisaragi, meaning his body has been reconstructed to be stronger and obey the orders of the generals. His latest mission? To do recon on an unknown alien planet with his new partner, the deadpan android Alice. There, he meets a busty female knight… riding a unicorn?! Thus begins their hilarious invasion of a magical fantasy world!
description.es: La Sociedad Secreta Kisaragi tiene una misión: dominación mundial. Afirman que es una organización malvada, pero su científica es excéntrica, sus ardientes generales mujeres usan poca ropa y están sorprendentemente preocupados por el destino del mundo. No. 6 es un Combatiente para Kisaragi, lo que significa que su cuerpo ha sido reconstruido para ser más fuerte y obedecer las órdenes de los generales. ¿Su última misión? Hacer reconocimiento en un planeta alienígena desconocido con su nueva pareja, la inexpresiva androide Alicia. Allí, conocí a una caballero tetona…¡¿montando un unicornio?! ¡Así comienza su hilarante invasión de un mundo mágico de fantasía!
description.pt: Havia uma empresa chamada Kisaragi, uma sociedade secreta do mal que derruba um número de heróis no mundo e está prestes a conquistar o muno. Como não se sabe os desejos dessa associação, o combatente N° 6, o protagonista, será despachado para outros planetas com a android Alice. No entanto, este combatente mudou as configurações da android pare que ela não se comportasse como se fosse uma invasão, e sim u festival de Ochin, fazendo seus companheiros ficarem estúpidos. Além disso, quando chamaram novos companheiros, os novos membros que se uniram atraíram estandarismo, como a estupida quimera e o bispo. Enquanto isso, o mesmo vendedor que invoca o exército Magus começa a invadir a terra para destruí-la. A notícia se espalha nas ruas por atos de contravenção, e é transmitida ao herói que estava carregando a virtude do mal. “Não há organizações más no mundo” combatente N° 6 finalmente entra em ação com as heroínas metamorfose e as táticas de Kudzu, invadindo o novo mundo.
description.ru: Протагонистом является старший элитный боец корпорации зла именуемой как "Тайное сообщество Кисараги", которого вместе с девочкой андроидом отправили в другое измерение. И так они оказываются в мире меча и магии, где им предстоит создать предпосылки для захвата этого нового мира корпорацией зла Кисараги.
description.pt-br: A Sociedade Secreta Kisaragi tem uma missão: dominar o mundo! Eles afirmam ser uma organização maligna, mas seu cientista é excêntrico, suas generais gostosas usam pouca roupa e estão surpreendentemente preocupadas com o destino do mundo?! O nº 6 é um combatente de Kisaragi, o que significa que seu corpo foi reconstruído para ser mais forte e obedecer às ordens dos generais. Sua última missão? Para fazer reconhecimento em um planeta alienígena desconhecido com sua nova parceira, a andróide inexpressiva Alice. Lá, ele conhece uma cavaleira peituda… montando um unicórnio?! Assim começa a hilariante invasão de um mundo mágico de fantasia!

altTitles.en: Otherside Picnic

description.en: The story is set in the modern world, but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side," where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors, and almost dies on the other side, when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl, but very skilled with a gun, and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together, both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.
description.ja: ネット上で実話怪談として語られる存在が出現する、この現実と隣り合わせで謎だらけの<裏世界>。研究とお金稼ぎ、そして大切な人を捜すため、鳥子と空魚は非日常へと足を踏み入れる。女子ふたり怪異探検サバイバル!!
description.ru: Сюжет разворачивается в современном мире, но в нем существуют двери, которые пропускают людей "на другую сторону", где оживают городские легенды и странные истории из Интернета. Студентка колледжа Сораво Камикоши находит одну из таких дверей и идет исследовать Потусторонье. Она почти погибает, когда ее спасает Торико Нишина. Торико - загадочная девушка, которая умело обращается с ружьем и кого-то ищет в Потусторонье. Вместе они начинают исследовать мир за дверями.

description.en:
“Lorella Mayred, our sincere congratulations on becoming a main character candidate.” 

It was an infuriating marriage life where after transmigrating, a wedding ceremony took place and right after getting married, my husband went off to war. I thought about getting a divorce and living a peaceful life afterward… but what? Obsession? That’s only fun when reading about it in novels!

… At that moment, a system window appeared before me. 

The possessed “Lorella Mayred” became a main character candidate. 

Will she be able to surpass her rivals and become the main character?

The main character is reborn as a character from a game he played in his previous life. This character falls into ruin along with the villainess, spending the last of their years together. Living as a needy farmer along with someone is unpleasant, so the main character seeks a profession. For now, he aims for becoming a blacksmith as he originally had skill in it. The popular light novel now in manga form!

In order to protect her precious family, Arachi borrows the status of Sunmi, instead of Hwang Shin-hye, and awakens her past power to find the person behind the attack. description.ar:
استقبللت عائللة للاتييا كارشييان عندما ذهب واللده فيي رحللة بحريية ، وللكن بعد انتشار شائعات حولل وفاته ، عامللوه كطفييلليي. تم تحرييضها من قبلل واللدييها اللساديييين واللييائسيين للللحصولل عللى موافقتهم ، للاتييا تتنمر عللى كارشييان بللا هوادة. ومع ذللك ، عندما ييعود واللد كارشييان كبطلل قوميي ودوق قويي ، يينتقم كارشييان بإعدام عائللة للاتييا بأكمللها! عندما تتذكر للحظاتها اللأخييرة ، أدركت أن عائللتها كانت تكذب عللييها طوالل اللوقت. للذللك عندما ييتم إرجاعها إللى اللماضيي ، فإنها مصممة عللى منع موتها ومعاللجة Karshian بشكلل صحييح هذه اللمرة. للكن هذا للن ييكون سهللاً عندما للا ييثق كارشييان فيي كلل خطوة للاتييا. هلل ستتمكن للاتييا من اللفوز عللى كارشييان وقللب اللطاوللة عللى عائللتها هذه اللمرة ، أم أنها محكوم عللييها باللموت مرة أخرى

---
[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/3372009529)

**Official Translations:**

description.en:
Originally, Latia's family had taken in Karshian as a favor to his father, who embarked on a maritime expedition for fame and fortune. However, after rumors begin to spread that the father had died at sea, they begin treating the young boy like a parasite. Egged on by her sadistic parents and desperate for their approval, Latia bullies Karshian relentlessly. When Karshian's father returns as a national hero and powerful duke, Karshian gets his revenge by executing Latia's entire family, including her of course! On the gallows, as her life flashes before her eyes, she realizes that her family had been lying to her and using her all along. So when she's thrown back into the past, she's determined to prevent her death and treat Karshian right this time. But this won't be easy as Karshian distrusts Latia's every move. Will Latia be able to win over Karshian and turn the tables on her family this time around, or is she doomed to die once more?

---
[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/3372009529)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/i-tamed-the-male-lead-who-tried-to-kill-me)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/17194)
description.es:
La familia de Latia acogió a Karshian cuando su padre se fue a una expedición marítima, pero después de que corrieron rumores de que estaba muerto, lo tratan como a un parásito. Instigada por sus padres sádicos y desesperada por su aprobación, Latia acosa a Karshian sin descanso. Sin embargo, cuando el padre de Karshian regresa como héroe nacional y poderoso duque, ¡Karshian se venga ejecutando a toda la familia de Latia! Mientras recuerda sus últimos momentos, se da cuenta de que su familia le había estado mintiendo todo el tiempo. Entonces, cuando es arrojada al pasado, está decidida a evitar su muerte y tratar a Karshian bien esta vez. Pero esto no será fácil cuando Karshian desconfíe de cada movimiento de Latia. ¿Podrá Latia ganarse a Karshian y darle la vuelta a su familia esta vez? ¿O está condenada a morir una vez más?

---
[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/3372009529)

description.fr:
La famille de Latia a accueilli Karshian lorsque son père est parti en expédition maritime, mais après que des rumeurs circulent selon lesquelles il est mort, ils le traitent comme un parasite. Poussée par ses parents sadiques et cherchant désespérément leur approbation, Latia intimide Karshian sans relâche. Cependant, lorsque le père de Karshian revient en tant que héros national et puissant duc, Karshian prend sa revanche en exécutant toute la famille de Latia! Alors qu'elle se remémore ses derniers instants, elle se rend compte que sa famille lui a toujours menti. Ainsi, lorsqu'elle est renvoyée dans le passé, elle est déterminée à empêcher sa mort et à traiter correctement Karshian cette fois. Mais ce ne sera pas facile lorsque Karshian se méfiera de tous les mouvements de Latia. Latia pourra-t-elle convaincre Karshian et renverser la situation avec sa famille cette fois-ci, ou est-elle condamnée à mourir une fois de plus?

---

description.id:
Keluarga Latia menerima Karshian saat ayahnya melakukan ekspedisi laut, tetapi setelah beredar desas-desus bahwa dia sudah meninggal, mereka memperlakukannya seperti parasit. Didorong oleh orang tuanya yang sadis dan sangat membutuhkan persetujuan mereka, Latia menindas Karshian tanpa henti. Namun, ketika ayah Karshian kembali sebagai pahlawan nasional dan adipati yang kuat, Karshian membalas dendam dengan mengeksekusi seluruh keluarga Latia! Ketika dia mengingat saat-saat terakhirnya, dia menyadari bahwa keluarganya telah membohonginya selama ini. Jadi ketika dia terlempar kembali ke masa lalu, dia bertekad untuk mencegah kematiannya dan memperlakukan Karshian dengan benar kali ini. Tapi ini tidak akan mudah ketika Karshian tidak mempercayai setiap gerakan Latia. Akankah Latia dapat memenangkan hati Karshian dan membalikkan keadaan pada keluarganya kali ini, atau apakah dia akan mati sekali lagi?

---

남주를 괴롭히다 사형대에 오르게 된 악역 '라티아'는 
죽음 앞에서 3년 전으로 회귀한다. 
그녀는 다시 목숨을 잃지 않기 위해 남주와의 악연을 청산하기로 결심하고, 
전생과 회귀 전 삶에서 쌓아온 지식으로 올바른 자리를 만들어 간다. 
그런데, 남주가 자꾸만 곁을 맴도는데…

description.ru:
— Я приговариваю Латию Глэделлис к смертной казни. 

Я была приговорена к смертной казни за жестокое обращение с сыном Героя Империи. Когда холодное лезвие коснулось моего затылка, я внезапно поняла.

*Я перевоплотилась в злодейку, которая мучила в детстве главного героя!*

Когда я наконец умерла, как в оригинале, каким-то образом я вернулась в прошлое. Однако ситуация по-прежнему остаётся ужасной.

— Хватит. Я ненавижу тебя.

— Ну же, перестаньте такое говорить.

*Это противозаконно — возвращаться в прошлое после того, как ты уже над ним издевалась!*

---

description.tr:
Başlangıçta, Latia'nın ailesi Karshian'ı şöhret ve servet için deniz seferine çıkan babasına bir iyilik olarak almıştı. Ancak, babanın denizde öldüğüne dair söylentiler yayılmaya başlayınca, genç çocuğa bir asalak gibi davranmaya başlarlar. Sadist ebeveynleri tarafından kışkırtılan ve çaresizce onaylarını bekleyen Latia, Karshian'a amansızca zorbalık yapar. Karshian'ın babası ulusal bir kahraman ve güçlü bir dük olarak geri döndüğünde, Karshian intikamını Latia'nın tüm ailesini idam ederek alır, tabii ki o da dahil! Darağacında hayatı gözlerinin önünden geçerken, ailesinin ona yalan söylediğini ve başından beri onu kullandığını anlar. Bu yüzden geçmişe geri döndüğünde, onun ölümünü engellemeye ve Karshian'ı bu sefer tedavi etmeye kararlıdır. Ancak Karshian, Latia'nın her hareketine güvenmediğinden bu kolay olmayacaktır. Latia, Karshian'ı kazanıp bu sefer ailesinin durumunu tersine çevirebilecek mi, yoksa bir kez daha ölmeye mi mahkum?

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

description.en: Urania was just a lowly maid until she captured the attention of King Kraus III and became his concubine. The nobles and the other maids, however, despised their love and dragged Urania down. Heartbroken and at her wit's end, she was ready to accept her death, but then a mysterious entity returns her to her past when she is still a maid. With her second chance at life, Urania is determined to become the king's concubine once more, but this all changes when she meets Oscar, who pushes her to aspire for greater things...
description.fr: Urania n'était qu'une modeste servante jusqu'à ce qu'elle attire l'attention du roi Kraus III et devienne sa concubine. Les nobles et les autres servantes, cependant, ont méprisé leur amour et ont entraîné Urania vers le bas. Le cœur brisé et à bout de souffle, elle était prête à accepter sa mort, mais une entité mystérieuse la ramène dans son passé alors qu'elle est encore femme de ménage. Avec sa deuxième chance dans la vie, Urania est déterminée à redevenir la concubine du roi, mais tout change lorsqu'elle rencontre Oscar, qui la pousse à aspirer à de plus grandes choses...
description.zh-hk:
曾是女僕出身，後來成為國王愛妾的惡女，尤雷尼婭。因為冤枉被處以死刑的她意外地重生了。

而且是回到了當下人的時候！ “這次我也要成為國王的愛妾 。並且這次我會萬事小心，不再招人嫉恨！”

只做過下人的尤雷尼婭這次也有著不成熟的目標…“你很有才能，所以可以去更好的地方。

”為了活下來，尤雷尼婭不得已成為了奧斯卡首相的助手，但卻意外地得到了首相的認可。

“吃喝玩樂怎麼了？如果可以的話，誰不想那麼活著？”“你沒有上進心嗎？”

一邊是只知道工作的奧斯卡，一邊是莫名其妙總是出現在自己附近的國王，尤雷尼婭“想要吃喝玩樂的願望”逐漸破碎！

由女僕蛻變為女王的浪漫喜劇現在開始！

description.en:
Logan McLain, a middle-aged knight fighting for the independence army, is intent on getting revenge against the empire which took over the kingdom and executed his brother when he ends up dying in battle. But when he wakes, he is a young man again, and has yet to be disowned for his terrible behavior. 

Using his experience and knowledge from his past life, Logan recruits a few talented individuals to develop new weapons, build an army, and make enough money to fund it all. 

But will he be able to make amends with his family and stop the empire's march?
description.ko:
후회로만 가득한 생.

스스로의 잘못을 깨닫고 다시 사람이 되고자 했을 때,
이미 가문은 불타 사라진 뒤였다.

발악 같은 분노로 하루하루 연명하던 삶.
그 절망의 끝에서, 간절한 염원이 하늘에 닿았다.

용서받지 못한 자.
운명을 거슬러 검을 들다.

description.en: One frigid December dawn, Song Yeon-woo meets an injured runaway alpha; inexplicably drawn toward his woodsy scent, he is compelled to help the young man. Despite his aversion to alphas due to trauma in his past, Yeon-woo somehow feels safe and welcomed in his presence. The two part in the moonlight, never to see one another again…but fate has other plans. Two years later, Yeon-woo has finally returned to the city to begin anew - still wary of alphas around him, he has built barriers in nearly every aspect of his life to keep himself safe. But when that a familiar scent begins to pierce through his boundaries, Yeon-woo is unable to stop himself from following them in pursuit of something thrilling…
description.ko:
어느 고요한 새벽, 연우는 자신의 허밍을 날카롭게 가르는 소리를 따라 한 가출 소년을 만났다. 자신의 도움에 날 선 반응을 보이는 소년이 왠지 귀여워 처음 보는 그과 열성들의 고충을 나눈 연우.

2년이 흐르고, 그날의 만남은 꿈이었던 것처럼 다가오는 알파들에게 경계를 풀지 않는 연우. 하지만 그 경계 사이로 청량한 나무 향의 페로몬이 스며들고, 연우는 스스로를 말릴 새도 없이 그 향을 따라 아주 강한 알파 김 신을 마주하게 되는데.
description.uk: Одного тихого ранку, Йону пішов за звуком, що раптово перервав його наспівування, і зустрів хлопця, що втік з дому. Незнайомець різко відреагував на бажання Йону допомогти, але з якоїсь причини той все одно здався йому милим. В результаті Йону вирішив поділитися з незнайомцем життєвими труднощами рецесивних омег. З того часу минуло 2 роки. Сон Йону, якому та зустріч здавалася лише сном, нині не може і на мить послабити свою пильність поряд з альфами. Одного дня, феромон з приємним ароматом зеленого листя руйнує його настороженість. Йону, будучи не в змозі зупинити себе, слідує за цим запахом і натикається на альфу на ім'я Кім Шин.
